text: cat lovers especially hello TV fans this
restaurant may be just what you're
looking for here almost every dish has
the famous marvelous felines image from
cakes to cappuccino and burgers the
place is packed from lunch to dinner
with diners of all ages I really like it
here there's so many Hello Kitty images
I've heard even the toilets decorated in
Hello Kitty
but despite the cutesy atmosphere themed
restaurants are a cutthroat business
everybody tries to make that business
stand out to survive so that's why there
are so many themed restaurants it's a
growing trend it's so much so that even
the toilet theme is not spared at least
three restaurants have opened in Taiwan
featuring a toilet atmosphere customers
drink out of urinal shaped containers
and poo is a natural topic of
conversation during meals of course you
may but not all theme restaurants in
Taiwan make it several have shut down
including the world's first barbie
restaurant as well as one with a
hospital theme where waitresses dress in
nurses uniforms serve beverages to
customers using syringes but some like
this restaurant where almost everything
except the food is made of cardboard do
really well its owner has opened several
branches not only in Taiwan but overseas
using a theme for a business has proved
so successful here than now hotels are
also moving into this market this one
has a slide that arose from the second
floor to the lobby it's become a big hit
for kids and parents
